item.description:
This Meetup group is for anyone who is a Real Estate Investor or interested in becoming a Real Estate Investor. There are many beginners attending so don't be shy. We will discuss various topics of real estate investing to include but not limited to, financing, finding a deal, single fam investments, multi-fam, foreclosures, options, notes, etc. If you are an expierenced Investor we would love to hear from you too. please contact me anytime if this is of any interest to you.
Thank you,

Sincerely,

-Peter

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: The Metro West Real Estate Buying & Investing April Meetup
